tool_description: Analyzes visual characteristics and morphometric data to generate species identification candidates with confidence scores.

body_size.description: General body size category: small, medium, large, extra_large

secondary_colors.description: Additional colors present on the animal

distinctive_markings.description: Notable patterns, spots, stripes, or unique features

bill_beak_shape.description: Shape of bill or beak if applicable: pointed, curved, flat, hooked

tail_characteristics.description: Tail shape and length: short, long, forked, rounded, pointed

leg_color.description: Color of legs and feet if visible

wing_patterns.description: Wing markings or patterns observed during flight or display

behavioral_posture.description: Notable posture or stance: upright, crouched, perched, swimming

habitat_context.description: Habitat where observed: forest, wetland, grassland, urban, coastal

geographic_region.description: Geographic region for range filtering: north_america, south_america, europe, asia, africa, oceania

error_messages: Invalid body size: Must be one of [small, medium, large, extra_large].
Invalid geographic region: Must be one of [north_america, south_america, europe, asia, africa, oceania].
Invalid bill shape: Must be one of [pointed, curved, flat, hooked] or null.
Invalid tail characteristics: Must be one of [short, long, forked, rounded, pointed] or null.
Empty color specification: primary_color cannot be empty.
Invalid behavioral posture: Must be one of [upright, crouched, perched, swimming] or null.
usage: Specify body_size, primary_color, and geographic_region as minimum requirements. Add secondary_colors, distinctive_markings, and morphological details to improve identification accuracy.

candidate_species.description: List of potential species matches ranked by likelihood

confidence_scores.description: Confidence percentages corresponding to each candidate species

identification_notes.description: Additional notes about distinguishing features or identification challenges
